meanings.definition: The quality or state of being soapy.
meanings.sent1: After washing the dishes, the saponaceousnesses of the soap left my hands feeling clean.
meanings.sent2: The bubbles in the bathwater demonstrated the saponaceousnesses of the new shampoo.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child added extra soap to the fountain, creating a fountain of saponaceousnesses.
meanings.sent4: The saponaceousnesses of the waterfall made it look like a giant bar of soap cascading down the rocks.
meanings.sent5: The saponaceousnesses of the detergent made the stains disappear effortlessly.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of having a soapy or lather-producing quality.
meanings.sent1: The baby's bath toys were chosen for their saponaceousnesses to make bath time more fun.
meanings.sent2: The saponaceousnesses of the hand soap made it a popular choice among the guests.
meanings.sent3: The prankster filled the fountain with bubble bath to enhance its saponaceousnesses.
meanings.sent4: The saponaceousnesses of the lake foam made it look like a giant bubble bath.
meanings.sent5: The luxurious shampoo was known for its saponaceousnesses and pleasant scent.
